features: Victorian bronze floor lamp solid metal construction: this standing lamp has a beautiful victorian bronze finish that is meticulously applied by hand giving it an exquisite high-end look.

description: Introduce a touch of traditional elegance to any room in your home with the Bronze Iron Scroll Torchiere Floor Lamp. This exquisite floor lamp features an open urn base design crafted from durable iron scrollwork and a lovely footed round base with decorative elements that harmoniously complement each other. The beautiful bronze finish adds a touch of warmth to any decor space, while the thick alabaster glass shade diffuses light in a soft and inviting way. The unique torchiere design of this standing lamp allows for upward light diffusion, illuminating any room with a gentle and warm glow. The alabaster glass shade is easy to appreciate once lit up, with its gentle waves of texture that give off a lush and soft light. Whether the lamp is on or off, the thickness of the glass and the hand-bent iron detail in a cage pattern give off a sense of quality and luxury. Constructed of solid metal and glass, this floor lamp is built to last. The substantial, sturdy scalloped base supports the iron and glass frame, ensuring a secure stance for this stunning piece of home decor. The weight of the base ensures stability and makes it perfect for placement in various decor spaces such as traditional, transitional, and modern settings. This floor lamp is a perfect addition to your living room, bedroom, office or any other space that requires a touch of elegance and style. The Bronze Iron Scroll Torchiere Floor Lamp is a piece of jewelry for your home that will complement any decor style and become a focal point in any room. The torchiere design of this floor lamp makes it perfect for reading, working, or creating a cozy ambiance in any room. This floor lamp is a great choice for any home looking for a traditional yet modern lighting solution. Victorian bronze floor lamp solid metal construction: this standing lamp has a beautiful victorian bronze finish that is meticulously applied by hand giving it an exquisite high-end look. This torchiere floor lamp features a bowl-shaped thick amber marbleized glass shade. The Glass is thick and has lovely Amber-colored Swirl Vane details flowing through the bowl-shaped shade. Save Money And Energy: Equipped with an incandescent socket, our tall floor lamp gives you the ability to select any medium-based bulb under 100W. However, to save energy we recommend using LED bulb Pole Lamp Lamp Uses 1 x 3-way 100 type A Watt Medium Base Bulb. Can be used with CFL or LED Medium base bulbs. (Bulb Not Included) Measures H: 72 Inches Diameter 12 Inches Pole Lamp Lamp Uses 1 x 3-way 100 type A Watt Medium Base Bulb. Can be used with CFL or LED Medium base bulbs. (Bulb Not Included) The Bronze Floor Lamp Measures H: 72 Inches Diameter 12 Inches
